item.title: The Jennifer Lawrence quotebook
item.ExtractedText: << Previous Â Next >> While most actresses are careful to give the press only the most pristine soundbites, Jennifer Lawrence is known for doing the exact opposite. Even better, it's worked in her favor: The 23-year-old is adored for her off-the-cuff wisecracks and random outbursts, all of which make her seem so normal. Here are some of our favorite JLaw quotes.
